name: CSS
description: I bring designs to life with CSS, crafting smooth animations, responsive layouts, and visually stunning web experiences.

name: JavaScript
description: The heart of web interactivity! I use JavaScript to build dynamic, responsive experiences that make websites feel alive.

name: Figma
description: My go-to for UI/UX design! I use Figma to prototype, collaborate, and create sleek, user-friendly interfaces with ease.

name: Photoshop
description: Perfect for crafting and enhancing visuals. I use Photoshop to create stunning graphics, edit images, and refine designs.

name: Illustrator
description: Ideal for vector design and branding. I use Illustrator to create sharp, scalable graphics, from logos to custom illustrations.

name: Vue
description: I love Vue for its simplicity and efficiency, making it easy to build reactive, scalable web applications with clean architecture.

name: Node.js
description: My go-to for backend development! I use Node.js to build fast, scalable APIs and real-time applications with ease.

name: Bootstrap
description: A powerful framework for rapid UI development!

name: Canvas
description: I once built a game using Canvas 2D! It's a powerful tool for creating interactive visuals, animations, and game mechanics directly in the browser.

name: Three.js
description: I used Three.js to develop a game, bringing 3D graphics and interactive environments to life. It's my go-to for immersive web experiences.

name: React
description: I use React to create fast, modular, and scalable web applications with ease.

name: After Effects
description: Perfect for motion graphics and animations. I use After Effects to create animated videos for my projects.

name: Whimsical
description: A great tool for wireframing and brainstorming. I use Whimsical to map out ideas, workflows, and UI structures visually.

name: Group Project
description: Couldn't have done it without my team! :)

name: ESMAD
description: School project done at School of Media Arts and Design.

name: ERASMUS+
description: School project done at Lodz University of Technology.

name: UA
description: School project done at University of Aveiro.

name: MongoDB
description: My favorite NoSQL database! I use MongoDB to store and manage data for my applications, ensuring flexibility and scalability.
